name: ckanext-dcat_usmetadata
description: This extension provides a react Admin UI for managing custom fields related to [DCAT-US Schema](https://https://resources.data.gov/resources/dcat-us/).

scripts.e2e: yarn dockerize && yarn && npx cypress run
scripts.build: yarn build:metadata-app && yarn move:builds && yarn rename:builds
scripts.build:metadata-app: cd metadata-app && yarn && yarn build && cd ..
scripts.move:builds: rm -rf ckanext/dcat_usmetadata/public && mkdir -p ckanext/dcat_usmetadata/public && cp -r metadata-app/build/static/* ckanext/dcat_usmetadata/public/
scripts.rename:builds: cd ckanext/dcat_usmetadata/public/ && mkdir static && mv media static/ &&  mv css/2.*.chunk.css css/2.chunk.css && mv css/main.*.chunk.css css/main.chunk.css && mv js/2.*.chunk.js js/2.chunk.js && mv js/main.*.chunk.js js/main.chunk.js && mv js/runtime-main.*.js js/runtime-main.js
scripts.start:dev: yarn dockerize && cd metadata-app && yarn && yarn start
